config.author: Tim Rogers
config.description: Simple Widget to display temperature, mode, etc for an ecobee thermostat
config.name: Ecobee Thermostat Widget
config.template:
• Heat
  • Cool
  • Auto
  • Off
{{itemValue(config.humidity)}}%
{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.temperature)}}
 °C
 °F
{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.desired_heat)}}° and holding
{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.desired_cool)}}° and holding
{{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.desired_cool)}}° - {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.desired_heat)}}° and holding
Resuming your schedule
{{config.remote_sensor_name}}: {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.remote_sensor_temp)}}°
{{config.remote_sensor_name}}: {{'%.0f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.remote_sensor_temp)}}°

config.author: Popov Andrey(original) and mclassen(rewirte)
config.description: Work with Netatmo Weather Station, Any Weather Station or any Temperature or Humidity Sensor

{{config.pres_label}} Pressure
{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.pres_item)}} {{config.pres_Unit}} N/A
{{itemValue(config.battery_item)}}%

config.author: Yannick Schaus / meteograms.com
config.description: Shows a meteogram from meteograms.com
config.name: Meteogram

config.description: Use https://meteograms.com and click your location then check the URL to get the coordinates
config.label: LOCATION

config.description: DE, FR, NL etc. Will be used to translate the labels in the country's language
config.label: Country code

config.description: More info: https://trello.com/c/dS5TWiZ0
config.label: METEOGRAM OPTIONS

config.description: Enter the URL of a file publicly accessible by the meteograms.com server to get options from. There is a settings showcase with ready-made JSON files at: https://trello.com/b/ST1CuBEm/meteogram-weather-charts
config.label: External settings file

config.author: JPL
config.description: Representation of a Max! radiator from eq3.
config.name: Max! radiator
config.template:
{{config.max_name}}
  • Normal (21 °C)
  • Energy saving (18 °C)
  • Minimum (5 °C)
  • Disconnect
Aperture
{{itemValue(config.max_temp_set)}}°C
{{itemValue(config.max_valve_aperture)}}%
  • Auto
  • Manual
  • Boost
  • Vacation
 {{itemValue(config.max_mode)=='AUTOMATIC'?'Auto':(itemValue(config.max_mode)=='MANUAL'?'Manual':(itemValue(config.max_mode)=='BOOST'?'Boost':'Vacation'))}}
{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.max_temp_actual)}} °C {{itemValue(config.max_battery)=='OFF'?'Batt. OK':'Replace batt.'}}

config.description: Operational mode: auto, manual, boost, etc.
config.label: Op. mode

config.author: Geo Magadan | nepotu.ro
config.description: A simple widget for Virtual Thermostats and/or On/Off Appliances scheduling | v=1.0-RC0
config.name: OH Scheduler

config.description: Scheduler type: Virtual Thermostat or On/Off Appliance
config.label: Scheduler Type

config.description: OpenHab item that will store the schedule
config.label: Schedule Store Item

config.description: Items configuration as array of objects (e.g. [{"setItem": "TargetItem", "label": "Item Label", "readItem": "ReadItem", "switchItem": "Switchitem"}])
config.label: Items

config.description: Hour Step (e.g. 1 Hour)
config.label: Hour Step

config.description: Minute Step (e.g. 5 Minutes)
config.label: Minute Step

config.description: OpenHab item that stores the Running Mode
config.label: Running Mode Item

config.description: Array of custom running modes (e.g.  ["OFF","MANUAL","AUTO","COOL","HEAT"]). If empty, then the default will be used.
config.label: Running Modes

config.description: Temperature unit: Celsius (°C) or Fahrenheit (°F)
config.label: Temperature Unit

config.description: Temperature Control Step
config.label: Temperature Step

config.description: Minimum Temperature
config.label: Min Temperature

config.description: Maximim Temperature
config.label: Max Temperature

config.description: Default Target Temperature
config.label: Target Temperature

config.description: Tick the box in order to hide the Running Mode select list.
config.label: Hide Running Mode

config.description: Tick the box in order to hide the Status tab.
config.label: Hide Status Tab

config.description: Tick this box in order to make the knobs on Status tab read-only. However this will not apply if the Running Mode is set to MANUAL.
config.label: Disable Target Temp Changes on Status tab

config.description: Tick the box in order to print in console all the objects used by this widget, once it is loaded.
config.label: Enable Debug
